item.title: Over Half of Gen Z Report Music-Linked Hearing Issues
item.description: With music festivals filling the summer calendar, over half of Gen Z report hearing issues from loud music — raising concern over long-term ear damage...

item.title: Retina Tear Raises Detachment Risk After Cataract Surgery

item.title: Starting a Family as a Physician: Delays, Struggles Abound
item.description: Many physicians delay starting a family, often not by choice, as training may clash with biology. Medscape Medical News
